titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Boris Andreevich Grushin Papers, 1960-1974
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Natasha Porfirenko; machine-readable finding aid created by Brooke Dykman Dockter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-10-18T11:16-0700

change.item: October 18, 2013: revised to add incremental materials March 25, 2011: revised to update encoding and add unitid by Elizabeth Phillips March 23, 2004: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Boris Andreevich Grushin Papers)//EN" "grushin.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Public opinion poll data, analyses, and reports, relating to Soviet public opinion, including public opinion of Soviet youth, regarding social conditions, social problems, urban issues, leisure, work, and values. Polls conducted for the newspaper Komsomol'skaia Pravda and for Soviet research institutions.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Boris Andreevich Grushin Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Grushin papers consist of public opinion poll data, codes, instructions, questionnaires, programs, analyses, reports, charts, tables, etc., from a number of polls conducted in the Soviet Union between 1960 and 1974 by Boris A. Grushin, a Russian sociologist and public opinion pollster. (Grushin is also founder and director of the Moscow-based public opinion firm "Vox Populi.")

Those public opinion surveys were prepared by various institutions: the Institute of Public Opinion, established by the newspaper Komsomol'skaia Pravda(1960-1967); the Institute of Concrete Social Research, the Philosophical Institute, and the Institute of Sociological Research, all three attached to the the Academy of Science of the USSR (1967-1974); and the Center for the Study of Public Opinion, at the Institute of Concrete Social Research (1969-1972).

These unique materials in Soviet history document the opinion of the Soviet people in general and of the Soviet youth in particular regarding social conditions and problems, urban issues, work and leisure, and values.

The collection is divided into three series, with the first two devoted to polls conducted by a certain institution, and the third to a specific public opinion project prepared by several institutions.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: INSTITUT OBSHCHESTVENNOGO MNENIIA, UCHREZHDENNYI GAZETOI KOMSOMOL'SKAIA PRAVDA (INSTITUTE OF PUBLIC OPINION, ESTABLISHED BY THE KOMSOMOL'SKAIA PRAVDA NEWSPAPER),

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bibliography, certificates, charts, clippings, codes, descriptions, examples, instructions, invoices, letters, plans, projects, programs, reports, statistics, tables, questionnaires, arranged chronologically by poll name

did.unittitle: Extracts from letters of Soviet citizens and foreign press,
Draft of the letter to an assistants not on the staff, and to the correspondents working for the newspaper,

Bibliografiia publikatsii v Komsomol'skoi Pravde, sviazannykh s deiatel'nost'iu Instituta obshchestvennogo mneniia (bibliography of publications in Komsomol'skaia Pravda, related to the activity of the Institute of Public Opinion),
"Udastsia li chelovechestvu predotvratit' voinu?" (averting a war),
"Dinamika i problemy urovnia zhizni" (standards of life),
"Itogi i perspektivy dvizheniia 'Za kommunisticheskii trud'" (movement 'For the Communist Work'),
"Znakomstvo detei s leksikoi vzroslykh, otrazhaiushchei ischeznuvshie I 'perezhitochnye' iavleniia v zhizni obshchestva" (introducing children to the adult vocabulary),
"Vo imia chego vy uchites'?" (what are you studying for?),
"Obiem, struktura i aktual'nye problemy svobodnogo vremeni" (leisure time),
"Mir tsennostei sovetskoi molodezhi" (values for the Soviet youth),
"Novinka prosit imia" (novelty asks for a name), Clippings
"Kak vas obsluzhivaiut?" (how have you been served?),
"Komsomol'tsy o komsomole" (Communist Youth Organization members about their organization),
From the Central Committee of the Communist Youth Organization on some quantitative characteristics of the organization
To the Central Committee of the Communist Youth Organization about the main research results
Copy of the question-answer fragments (from field information)
Enterprises and institutions where polls took place
"Vremia otpuskov - kak luchshe provesti ego?" (vacation time - how to organize it?),
Certificate for the Trade Union Center about vacation "geography" for people from different regions of the country
Plan of publications in Komsomol'skaia Pravda on research problems
"Chitatel' o sebe i o gazete" (readers about themselves and the newspaper),
"Naseleniie i ekonomicheskaia reforma" (population and economic reforms), Unpublished version of the analytic report
"Sud'ba gosudarstvennogo gimna SSSR" (state anthem of the Soviet Union),
Final chart of the analytic report to the CPSU Central Committee
Subject file - Kapeliush, I. C., Public Opinion on Problems of Elections, Printed copy
"P'iat' voprosov papam i mamam" (five questions to moms and dads), Clippings
"Pis'ma v 'Komsomol'skuiu Pravdu' i ikh avtory" (letters to Komsomol'skaia Pravda and their authors),

TSENTR IZUCHENIIA OBSHCHESTVENNOGO MNENIIA PRI INSTITUTE KONKRETNYKH SOTSIAL'NYKH ISSLEDOVANII ACADEMII NAUK SSSR (CENTER FOR THE STUDY OF PUBLIC OPINION AT THE INSTITUTE OF CONCRETE SOCIAL RESEARCH, ATTACHED TO THE ACADEMY OF SCIENCE OF THE USSR),

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Charts, codes, data, instructions, letters, plans, programs, proposals, questionnaires, reports, requests, tables, arranged chronologically by poll name

did.unittitle: Data on conducting the first nationwide poll, published in Komsomol'skaia Pravda,
To the vice-president of the Academy of Science, A. M. Rumiantsev
Material related to the first nationwide poll,
Models of the nationwide examples of the public opinion
Proposals for the creation of the allunion network of pollsters,
"Avtorskii korpus zhurnala Voprosy Filosofii" (authors's corps of the magazine Philosophical Questions). Ciphering code for the authors's cards,
"Glastnost' v rabote mestnykh organov upravleniia" (glasnost in the work of local government bodies). Questionnaire,
"Otnosheniie rukovodiashchikh kadrov k politicheskomu obrazovaniiu" (leading cadres and political education),
"Kontsertnaia auditoriia strany" (concert audience of the country). Research program,
"Problemy vuzovskogo komsomola" (Communist Youth League in higher education institutions). Field document,
"Problemy zheleznodorozhnogo i aviatsionnogo tranporta v strane" (railroad and air transportation in the country). Research program,
"Zaniatiia fizkul'turoi i sportom v strane" (sport education). Research program,
"Grafik vykhoda gazety 'Sovetskaia Rossiia'" (table of publications in the newspaper Soviet Russia),
"Prichiny p'ianstva i mery po bor'be s nim" (reasons for alcohol addiction),
Questionnaire for the detention centers for alcoholics
Final report "Look on Drunkenness from Inside the Detention Centers for Alcoholics"
"Obespechennost' naseleniia predmetami dlitel'nogo pol'zovaniia i plany ikh priobreteniia" (supply to the population of long-term consumption goods),
"Spros naseleniia na gramplastinki" (Demand for gramophone records),

"FUNKTSIONIROVANIIE OBSHCHESTVENNOGO MNENIIA V USLOVIIAKH GORODA I DEIATEL'NOST' GOSUDARSTVENNYKH I OBSHCHESTVENNYKH INSTITUTOV" (PUBLIC OPINION IN URBAN CITIES AND ACTIVITIES OF STATE AND PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Charts, codes, diary, instructions, interview, printed matter, programs, questionnaires, reports, tables, arranged chronologically by poll name. The surveys for this project were prepared by the Institute of Concrete Social Research, the Philosophical Institute, and the Institute of Sociological Research, all three attached to the Academy of Science of the USSR, 1967-1974
